thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com | 2 of 58
thread.title: Cathie Winn

author: Cathie Winn
title: Cathie Winn
text:
As a student, I have found Airtasker a great site to get the odd job to supplement my income.
It can be frustrating in that you make an offer and there is a lot of competition, but if you keep trying, you'll get something.
The other frustrating thing is jobs that you make an offer for that the poster never chooses someone and the job closes at the time limit.
Patience and persistence has been the key for me.
